contents.text:
Besides our own knowledge, this key is based on the publications of a diversity of renown colleagues which we assembled and put into new context for the German North Sea coastline. If you are interested in the sources for each group of species, please refer to the pdf versions of the ‘Additional Information’ and ‘Identification Key’. (Wenn möglich ‘Additional Information’ und ‘Identification Key’ verlinken zum PDF-Download.)

References
